TEXT.BODY: Oper shr loss 44 cts vs profit 58 cts Oper net loss 2.7 mln vs profit four mln Revs 13.3 mln vs 28.4 mln Avg shrs 6.1 mln vs seven mln NOTE: Prior year excludes extraordinary gain of 21 cts per share. Reuter
